colors.title: Color System
colors.lead: These hues express the clarity, freshness, and reliability at the heart of AquaPump. Use them confidently and consistently.

cards.label: Primary
cards.name: AquaPump Blue
cards.note: HEX #0B63F6 · RGB 11 99 246 — Hero backgrounds, navigation, and core CTAs.

cards.label: Accent
cards.name: Cascade Aqua
cards.note: HEX #12B4FF · RGB 18 180 255 — Gradients, highlights, and informational chips.

cards.label: Foundation
cards.name: Deep Marine
cards.note: HEX #102542 · RGB 16 37 66 — Headlines, body copy, and contrast against light surfaces.

cards.label: Energy
cards.name: Hydro Green
cards.note: HEX #2BB673 · RGB 43 182 115 — Sustainability messages, success states, and data wins.

type.title: Typeface Pairing
type.lead: Lean on bold, confident typography to balance engineering precision with brand warmth.

cards.label: Display
cards.heading: AQUAPUMP
cards.body: Use for hero titles, section headlines, and prominent numbers. Tight tracking and uppercase deliver strength.

cards.label: Support
cards.heading: Sifonn Pro
cards.body: Pair with lighter weights for body copy, captions, and multilingual content. Generous line-height keeps long-form easy to scan.

usage.title: Bring It To Life
usage.lead: From print collateral to the web, keep layouts bright, spacious, and anchored by the AquaPump drop.

cards.title: Logo Clearspace
cards.body: Preserve one full logomark radius on all sides. Use the blue circle on light grounds and the white knockout on deep marine.

cards.title: Grid & Balance
cards.body: Align content to a centered column. Pair gradients with soft shadows to echo the flow of water and kinetic energy.

cards.title: Voice & Tone
cards.body: Write with clarity and optimism. Highlight measurable impact, service reliability, and sustainable innovation.

logo.title: Signature Mark
logo.lead: Always keep the AquaPump drop crisp, centered, and breathing. Use these lockups for primary placements.

cards.title: Light Background
cards.caption: Use the full-color mark with subtle shadowing to keep edges sharp.

cards.title: Dark Background
cards.caption: Knock out the wordmark to white and retain the aqua ring to preserve contrast.

cards.title: Icon-Only
cards.caption: The droplet symbol can act as a favicon or social avatar. Minimum size 32px.

cards.title: Download Assets
cards.caption: Need files? Save the SVG for print-perfect scaling across media.
